name: Productores Locales de Medicamentos A.G.
goal:
Prolmed represents the interest of pharmaceutical companies with high quality production located in Chile.

Current members represent ~50% of the Chilean market, and are focused on innovative products as well as branded generics and INN generics. These companies play a critical rol both in the private and public sector, supplying high quality medicines.
euInitiatives:
Prolmed is following the negotiation of the modernization of the Association Agreement entered into by and beween the European Union and the Republic of Chile.

Main concern are the pharma-related provisions of the Intellectual Property Chapter.
